**Insight lifecycle**

- [ ] Draft is created (gdoc)
- [ ] Reviewed by editor (gdoc)
- [ ] Content reviewed by Marketing (gdoc)
- [ ] Graphics created (gdoc -> assets)
- [ ] Published (gdoc -> md)
